pullrequest.title: add filters class (split out of pull request #999).

content.raw:
I was having an internal debate about the name of `Filters.cc/hh`
I believe it should be renamed to 'MovingWindowFilter`.

`Filters` implies that there are multiple filters and/or there is some kind of base class that other filters can be derived from.
content.html:
I was having an internal debate about the name of Filters.cc/hh I believe it should be renamed to 'MovingWindowFilter`.

Filters implies that there are multiple filters and/or there is some kind of base class that other filters can be derived from.
